package.name: cob_people_perception
package.description: Contains several packages for detecting and identifying faces, and detecting and tracking humans with RGB-D sensors or laser scanners. Detects persons through head and face detection and identifies the detected faces. The results are tracked over time to increase confidence. The system is optimized to be used with a Microsoft Kinect or Asus Xtion Pro Live sensor but could also handle different sensors as long as depth and color images are provided.
